title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Through Analysis of Learning Rest Periods and Exam Preparation Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: The quantitative impact of learning rest period design on academic achievement can be analyzed
A report evaluating the effectiveness of exam preparation periods can be written based on learning analytics data
Instructional design improvement strategies can be proposed by interpreting mixed-effects logistic regression analysis results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
